name: effectivenessfactor
description: Description of the effect of intra-particle diffusivity on a chemical reaction taking place within a single particle. The result is a dimensionless number that modifies (typically reduces) the calculated reaction rate assuming idealized conditions.

dimensions.name: nparameters
dimensions.description: Number of parameters that are needed to evaluate the function.

dimensions.name: narguments
dimensions.description: Number of additional arguments passed to the functional form.

properties.name: functionalForm
properties.description: The name of the mathematical expression that defines the effectivenessFactor.

properties.name: parameters
properties.description: The list of parameters that is needed to evaluate the mathematical expression.

properties.name: arguments
properties.description: The semantic name of the arguments needed to evaluate the functional form.
